name: Geometric Harmony Tote
description: A beautifully crafted tote bag featuring traditional geometric block prints on premium organic cotton. Perfect for daily use with spacious interior and comfortable handles.
care: 100% organic cotton. Machine wash cold with like colors. Tumble dry low. Iron on medium heat.
dimensions: 40cm W × 35cm H × 10cm D. Handle drop: 25cm. Perfect for daily essentials and more.

name: Royal Paisley Tote
description: Elegant paisley patterns that celebrate the royal heritage of Indian textile art. Crafted with attention to detail and premium materials.
care: 100% organic cotton. Hand wash recommended for best results. Air dry in shade. Iron on low heat.
dimensions: 42cm W × 36cm H × 12cm D. Handle drop: 26cm. Spacious design for all your needs.

name: Mandala Meditation Tote
description: Intricate mandala designs that bring spiritual energy to your everyday style. Each pattern is carefully hand-blocked by master artisans.
care: 100% organic cotton. Gentle machine wash cold. Lay flat to dry. Steam iron for best results.
dimensions: 38cm W × 34cm H × 8cm D. Handle drop: 24cm. Compact yet functional design.

name: Zen Garden Tote
description: Minimalist block prints inspired by zen philosophy and natural beauty. Perfect for those who appreciate subtle elegance.
care: 100% organic cotton. Machine wash cold with mild detergent. Tumble dry low. Iron as needed.
dimensions: 39cm W × 33cm H × 9cm D. Handle drop: 23cm. Minimalist design with maximum utility.

name: Spice Route Tote
description: Warm spice-inspired colors with paisley patterns that tell tales of ancient trade routes. A fusion of history and style.
care: 100% organic cotton. Cold wash recommended. Air dry for longevity. Iron on medium heat.
dimensions: 41cm W × 35cm H × 11cm D. Handle drop: 25cm. Perfect balance of style and function.

name: Heritage Mandala Tote
description: Our premium mandala collection piece, showcasing the finest traditional craftsmanship. A true work of art that doubles as a functional accessory.
care: 100% premium organic cotton. Professional dry cleaning recommended. Store in dust bag when not in use.
dimensions: 43cm W × 37cm H × 13cm D. Handle drop: 27cm. Premium design for discerning customers.

name: Artisan's Pride Tote
description: Celebrating the pride of our artisans with bold block print designs that showcase generations of skill and tradition.
care: 100% organic cotton. Machine wash cold separately. Air dry recommended. Iron on reverse side.
dimensions: 40cm W × 34cm H × 10cm D. Handle drop: 24cm. Artisan-inspired design.

name: Desert Bloom Tote
description: Inspired by the desert's resilient beauty, featuring delicate paisley motifs that bloom across the canvas like flowers in the sand.
care: 100% organic cotton. Gentle cycle wash cold. Flat dry in shade. Steam iron for best finish.
dimensions: 41cm W × 36cm H × 12cm D. Handle drop: 26cm. Desert-inspired elegance.
